Question: Case Western Reserve University CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Case Western Reserve University

Product: CES 2024 Exhibitors

- 18 exhibitors, including 10 student/alumni ventures, 2 CWRU startup companies, and 5 faculty innovations
- Innovations cover artificial intelligence, augmented reality, virtual reality, digital health, fitness, wellness, robotics, drones, entertainment content, sustainability, and more
- Notable exhibitors include Menlo Park Patents, Notus Labs, Everykey, Afference, Carbon Origins Inc., XaTek Inc., Biohm Health, CrabLine Robotics LLC, UAVistas, NeverEnding Inc., ViviScore Composer, Atmata, Escargots Kaïy, Panaciia Beauty, Dory Power, Sprinklifier, LEAF, and more
Summary_cn:
凯斯西储大学

产品：CES 2024展商

- 18个展商，包括10个学生/校友创业项目，2个CWRU初创公司以及5个教职工创新项目
- 创新涵盖人工智能、增强现实、虚拟现实、数字健康、健身、健康、机器人、无人机、娱乐内容、可持续性等等
- 著名的展商包括Menlo Park Patents、Notus Labs、Everykey、Afference、Carbon Origins Inc.、XaTek Inc.、Biohm Health、CrabLine Robotics LLC、UAVistas、NeverEnding Inc.、ViviScore Composer、Atmata、Escargots Kaïy、Panaciia Beauty、Dory Power、Sprinklifier、LEAF等等
